title: LADYHAWKE 1985 Multi-Lang WS DVD full (NTSC Japan)
description:
? Japanese release - ONLY the main menu in Japanese. The rest is in English and NOT dubbed
? When the DVD plays there are your usual copyright warnings and 29 second intro from 20th Century Fox after which it goes straight on to the film. The Japanese menu does not appear unless manually accessed with your remote/DVD software. See Notes below for menu translations.
